All, does anyone know if the Akao smith Yoshitsugu ( Shodai and Nidai ) 
was the only smith of this group ( 9 generations I think ) that worked 
in tetsu ?. I see the 1st and the 2nd Yoshitsugu worked in Shakudo 
Sukashi after they moved to Edo, but worked in iron whilst in Echizen. 
Did any of the other 7 Yoshitsugu's work in Iron, or were they all in 
Shakudo and Shibuichi plate.

Also, I see the Nidai signed ???? ( Akao Yoshitsugu if the kanji does 
not come out ), did any other of the group sign this way ?.

Cheers

Rich Turner
